name.ja: Site History Express: ウェブサイトの履歴を素早くナビゲート
name.zh_CN: Site History Express: 快速导航网站历史记录

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access recently visited pages on the current site.
short.ja: 現在のウェブサイトで最近閲覧したページにすばやくアクセスします。
short.zh_CN: 快速访问当前网站上最近浏览过的页面。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A video is coming shortly, but for now, this tool displays all of the pages you've visited on a particular domain such as your custom CRM and allows you to quickly navigate to them.

BONUS - if you have the tools from The Marketers Toolkit installed on your CRM - instead of opening the page in a new window, it will simply quickly navigate internally to that page.

This is a small offshoot of an open source project by wildseeder on github.
https://github.com/site-history-express/site-history-express
